mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DESKTOP_CASE_MANUFACTURER DCM JOIN DESKTOP_CASE_TYPE DCY ON DCM.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = DCY.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_STANDARD DCPS ON DCY.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = DCPS.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN DESKTOP_CASE_SIZE DCS ON DCPS.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = DCS.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN DESKTOP_CASE_SUPPORTED_BOARD DCSB ON DCS.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = DCSB.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX

SELECT DC.DESKTOP_CASE_IDX, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_MANUFACTURER_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_MANUFACTURER WHERE MANUFACTURER_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_MANUFACTURER_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_MANUFACTURER_NAME, DC.DESKTOP_CASE_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_TYPE_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_TYPE WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_TYPE_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_TYPE_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_MATERIAL_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_MATERIAL WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_MATERIAL_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_MATERIAL_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_MATERIAL_NAME, DC.DESKTOP_CASE_COLOR, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_WIDTH_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_WIDTH WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_WIDTH_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_WIDTH_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_WIDTH_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_LENGTH_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_LENGTH WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_LENGTH_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_LENGTH_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_LENGTH_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_HEIGHT_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_HEIGHT WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_HEIGHT_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_HEIGHT_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_HEIGHT_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_WEIGHT_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_WEIGHT WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_WEIGHT_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_WEIGHT_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_WEIGHT_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_GPU_LENGTH_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_GPU_LENGTH WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_GPU_LENGTH_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_GPU_LENGTH_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_GPU_LENGTH_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_CPU_COOLER_HEIGHT_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_CPU_COOLER_HEIGHT WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_CPU_COOLER_HEIGHT_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_CPU_COOLER_HEIGHT_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_CPU_COOLER_HEIGHT_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_FAN_SLOTS_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_FAN_SLOTS WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_FAN_SLOTS_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_FAN_SLOTS_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_FAN_SLOTS_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_RADIATOR_SUPPORT_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_RADIATOR_SUPPORT WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_RADIATOR_SUPPORT_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_RADIATOR_SUPPORT_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_RADIATOR_SUPPORT_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_DRIVE_BAYS_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_DRIVE_BAYS WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_DRIVE_BAYS_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_DRIVE_BAYS_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_DRIVE_BAYS_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_USB_PORTS_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_USB_PORTS WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_USB_PORTS_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_USB_PORTS_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_USB_PORTS_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_SIZE_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_SIZE WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_SIZE_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_SIZE_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_SIZE_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_SUPPORTED_BOARD_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_SUPPORTED_BOARD WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_SUPPORTED_BOARD_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_SUPPORTED_BOARD_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_SUPPORTED_BOARD_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_SIDE_PANEL_TYPE_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_SIDE_PANEL_TYPE WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_SIDE_PANEL_TYPE_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_SIDE_PANEL_TYPE_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_SIDE_PANEL_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_LENGTH_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_LENGTH WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_LENGTH_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_LENGTH_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_LENGTH_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_VGA_LENGTH_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_VGA_LENGTH WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_VGA_LENGTH_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_VGA_LENGTH_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_VGA_LENGTH_NAME, DC.DESKTOP_CASE_ORIGIN_PRICE, DC.DESKTOP_CASE_NOW_PRICE, DC.DESKTOP_CASE_RELEASE_DATE, COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_STANDARD_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_STANDARD WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_STANDARD_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_STANDARD_IDX) AS DESKTOP_CASE_POWER_STANDARD_NAME, (SELECT DESKTOP_CASE_SFILE_NAME FROM DESKTOP_CASE_IMAGE WHERE DESKTOP_CASE_IDX = DC.DESKTOP_CASE_IDX )
FROM DESKTOP_CASE AS DC
